促.definition: (bound form) of short duration; hasty; rapid; (bound form) to hasten; to hurry; to urge; (literary) close by; pressed against

促使.definition: to prompt; to induce; to spur

促弦.definition: to tighten the strings (of a musical instrument)

促成.definition: to facilitate; to help bring about

促聲.definition: entering tone (synonym of 入聲|入声[ru4sheng1])

促膝談心.definition: (idiom) to sit side-by-side and have a heart-to-heart talk

促進.definition: to promote (an idea or cause); to advance; boost
